thread.title: Perrie Edwards 'mortified' with Jesy Nelson after bandmate mentions ex Zayn Malik in post-BRITs interview
thread.title_full: Perrie Edwards 'mortified' with Jesy Nelson after bandmate mentions ex Zayn Malik in post-BRITs interview

author: Mirror .co.uk
title: Perrie Edwards 'mortified' with Jesy Nelson after bandmate mentions ex Zayn Malik in post-BRITs interview
text:
Perrie Edwards gives viewers an eyeful at Brits Share this video Watch Next Fearne Cotton and Holly Willoughby present Perrie Edwards, Jesy Nelson, Jade Thirlwall and Leigh-Anne Pinnock of Little Mix with the award for Best British Single (Photo: Getty Images) Exes Zayn Malik and Perrie Edwards (Photo: Rex Features) 
And following their big win, Jesy appeared to take it one step further - namechecking Zayn during a backstage interview. 
According to The Sun, Jesy said, "Shout out to ZM!" 
But Perrie was less than impressed and reportedly told her to "shut up, stop!" before joking, "I'm going to kill you." (Photo: Rex Features) 
The girls have previously said Shout Out To My Ex features lyrics about Perrie and Zayn's relationship. 
While speaking about the tough split, Perrie said: "It was horrible, the worst time of my life. A four-year relationship, two-year engagement ended by a simple text message. Just like that. Perrie Edwards confirms romance with Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain (Photo: Instagram/PerrieEdwards) 
"Even though things with my career were going really well, it was incredibly difficult for meâ€¦ On the surface I was happy, but inside I felt broken." 
Perrie is now dating Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain who is her first serious love interest since her split from the former One Direction star in 2015. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
